entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
